rules_text: When Schefelix, Abyssal Retriever enters, you may exile a creature card from your graveyard. If you do, search your library for a card with the same name as that card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: [i]Loyalty can only be earned in our own despair, but that trust can also pull us out of our same torments.[/i]
